remarks: An atomistic lattice with 0 is relatively atomic.  Part of Lemma 7.2 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 30.  ( ~ chpssati , with ` /\ ` swapped, analog.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Dec-2011.)
statement:
hlrelat1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
hlrelat1.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
hlrelat1.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
hlrelat1.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
hlrelat1 $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .< Y -> E. p e. A ( -. p .<_ X /\ p .<_ Y ) ) ) $.
$d .<_ p $.
$d A p $.
$d B p $.
$d K p $.
$d X p $.
$d Y p $.
